def query(self, start, stop):
    res_left = res_right = self._default
    while start < stop:
        if start & 1:
            res_left = self._func(res_left, self.data[start])
            start += 1
        if stop & 1:
            # TODO: Your code here
            res_right = self._func(self.data[stop-1], res_right)
            stop -=1
        start >>=1
        stop >>=1
    return self._func(res_left, res_right) Wait, the code for the stop condition is missing.
